content: looking for a quick project to whip up for halloween this no-sew spider crochet pattern is a fun beginner friendly pattern that s perfect for spooky season this quick and easy amigurumi spider has all of the cuteness and none of the sewing it would make a great addition to your next market/craft fair or a fun gift the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * super bulky yarn * 4 5mm crochet hook * 6mm safety eyes * 8mm safety eyes * 4 ply yarn in black or black embroidery floss * polyester fiberfill * stitch marker yarn needle scissors the finished item measure approximately 4 10cm wide including the legs item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/crochet-spider-pattern/
